summary: The diff implements all three required features (REQ-26, REQ-27, REQ-28) with dedicated components: BluetoothSpeakerDisplay.tsx, ProcessorPage.tsx, SoundMagnet.tsx, SoundMagnetToggle.tsx, and useSoundMagnet.ts hook. The App.tsx integrates all components with tab navigation. Most acceptance criteria appear to be met, with a few minor gaps identified due to file truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Intelligent Amp status — 'Does NOT Limit Music — It CORRECTS It — It Is A Stabilizer' section must be present in the Processor page
missing_requirements.reason: The ProcessorPage.tsx diff is truncated mid-file before the lower spec sections are visible, making it impossible to confirm this specific text element is rendered.

missing_requirements.requirement: Special DAW VST Generator with Big Grant FPGA, CPU Booster, Signal Stimulation section must be present
missing_requirements.reason: The ProcessorPage.tsx diff is truncated before these sections can be confirmed as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Spec readout: 12 Volt — Best Processor World — 20 Core — 30 Thunders Wide must be displayed
missing_requirements.reason: The ProcessorPage.tsx diff is truncated and this specific spec readout section cannot be confirmed as present.

hallucinated_features.description: Sound Magnet toggle subtitle reads 'by Gerrod' and references 'Musi Baby M88' speaker model
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention 'by Gerrod' or the specific 'Musi Baby M88' device name. These are additional text elements not requested in any requirement.
